affect ( "big_patrol", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );

	task ( "bg" )
	{
		set ( "SET_GOAL", "Guard" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "big_patrol_a" );
		set ( "SET_NAVGOAL2", "big_patrol_b" );
		set ( "SET_NAVGOAL3", "big_patrol_c" );
	}

	dowait ( "bg" );
}
